Class FlexMessagingService

java.lang.Object

public class FlexMessagingService
extends Object

Service that can execute compatibility Flex messages.

The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Joachim Bauch (jojo@struktur.de), Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com)
